translate("Install Bibledit on Ubuntu")

translate("Follow the steps below to install Bibledit.")

  1. translate("Open a terminal.")

  2. translate("On older versions of Ubuntu, or to get updated Bibledit software:") translate("Add the Bibledit repository:")

    sudo add-apt-repository ppa:bibledit/ppa

    translate("As of Ubuntu 18.04, the above is no longer needed.")

  3. translate("Read the repository:")

    sudo apt update

  4. translate("Install Bibledit:")

    sudo apt install bibledit

translate("Bibledit can be started from the menu.")
